divs: Sighting DetailsIt was approximately 7:35 when I was walking out of a shop-rite in Dumont NJ. I looked up at the sky as there were absolutely no clouds, and it was quite beautiful. I looked at the moon (which always amazes me when I see it in daylight). As i looked at the moon, i saw a plane flying (probably coming from Newark), and above the plane I saw this white object, I could see that it was not a plane, as it had no wings, and there were other planes flying in the area. They all look dark grey as the sun was setting in the west, and i was following the object as it flew (more like glided) from southwest to east. All of the planes that i was looking at, as i mentioned appeared dark grey and i could see the red and green lights. This object was white and was definately not a plane or a satellite. After approximately 5 - 10 minutes the object vanished from view heading in a easterly direction.
Summary: White cylindrical object moving from west to east
trends: There has been one other sighting in Hackensack
There were no other sightings in Hackensack on or around August 10th 2005
